metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10109 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in pcsc-lite before 1.8.20 allows a remote attackers to cause denial of service (crash) via a command that uses "cardsList" after the handle has been released through the SCardReleaseContext function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10109` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcsclite1 - 1.8.14-1ubuntu1.16.04.1
pcscd - 1.8.14-1ubuntu1.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcsc-lite package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.14-1ubuntu1.16.04.1').
